short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RVR assets price ticker (price taken from 'coinmarketcap.com'). Extension shows RVR assets valued in cryptocurrencies and USD.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RVR (VOXELS) assets price ticker

UPDATE: fixed coinmarketcap API changes

This extension shows steem assets values priced in cryptocurrencies and American Dollars(BTC, USD).
Values are refreshed every 4 minutes.
You can refresh them manually by clicking extension icon.
Values are based on data provided by 'www.coinmarketcap.com' API and are most likely appropriate, but don't have to be.
No special permissions are needed to install this extension. Tips appreciated:
RVR: VN9XgFGznUvfXMdfQVYLGBFCDSd7hQe7SV
